TextView.android:text: Customer Pest Management Program file in place
If the CPMP file is not in place,put the image of acknowledgement sheet.
PO- Customer Purchase Order / Service agreement
Rentokil PCI Serving branch License copy- Form- VI C or 8
List of Approved Preparation(APL) with Dilution ratios
Images of Damaged Rodent Stations(If any)
Rodent Station / Glue Trap is free of any Foreign body / Wetness / Dust -
No of Exoroach Trap Stations Installed & in How many Roaches are Trapped
Images of Exoroach Placed with Roaches Trapped
No of IMT's Placed T in How many Roaches were Trapped
Images of IMT's which have Roaches Trapped
